name: Into the Iron Mist
description:
An entry for Ludum Dare 47 : Stuck in a loop! All 3D art and most of the code and assets were done by my wife and I over 72 hours.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/into-the-iron-mist

I abused a lot of particle effects and didn't test on other machines so I hope it runs ok for you!

You'll need to continuously collect better and better parts to reach the end of the game.

DEV NOTES / KNOWN ISSUES

Linux and Mac versions will arrive soon!

This project is in debug mode right now until I can track a specific error that crashes the release build. All that means for you is a command window runs alongside it.

We made art for sword and shield weapons but they didn't make the cut. I'll release another version sometime soon with them for fun, with a note to ignore that version for ludum dare ratings.
